TopicTitle: Allow changing the maximum debris cap

Articles.Content:
I got the bright idea last night to start a sandbox mode game and build a series of rockets with the goal of giving Kerbin kessler syndrome. Several successful (at least by this definition) launches later, I found that I could have no more than 246 pieces of debris kept track of at a time.

While I understand there is likely to be a big performance hit with a lot of pieces, it would be fantastic to be able to realize my (terrible) goal. If this could be adjustable (or if it already is somehow), I'd appreciate it.

Main menu -> Settings -> General -> Max Persistent Debris.

Your requested feature already exists. You should try searching settings for it before requesting it.

Already exists, yup. I don't think we really need to keep this open, then, eh?

I'll close it, I think.
